General.Name: BUMI RESOURCES - Dusseldorf Stock Exchang
General.Description: PT Bumi Resources Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in mining business in Indonesia. It operates through Coal, Services, Oil and Gas, and Gold segments. The company owns coal mining concessions of approximately 90,938 hectares located in Sangatta and Bengalon in the East Kalimantan province; operates 6 open cut coal mines in the north shore of Pulau Laut; and manages a concession area of 8,250.5 hectares located in Loa Ulung and Tabang, East Kalimantan, as well as has 17,840 hectares concession in Muara Enim, South Sumatera. It also operates 2 oil and gas exploration concessions comprising Block R2 that covers an area of 2,139 square kilometers; and Block 13, which covers an area of 5,563 square kilometers located in the Republic of Yemen. In addition, the company explores for gold and copper, molybdenum, zinc, and lead ores. Further, it offers marketing and management services. The company was formerly known as PT Bumi Modern Tbk. and changed its name to PT Bumi Resources Tbk in September 2000. PT Bumi Resources Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
